markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 5"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Cloud Gazer](/Feats.aspx?ID=2596) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Sylph" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=311" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 114 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

Your connection to air allows you to see through obscuring mists. You can see well enough through fog, mist, and clouds that would normally cause creatures to be [concealed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=4) that you don't need to succeed at a flat check to target creatures benefiting from such concealment.
name: Cloud Gazer
